name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience in creating high-performance applications specifically leveraging **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **PostgreSQL**. Proficient in both frontend and backend development and adept at using **React Native** and **Expo**. Proven ability to align development with the software development lifecycle, exhibiting strong methodologies knowledge.
Demonstrated expertise in building innovative solutions with a focus on AI/ML integrations, predictive analytics, and real-time data processing. Hands-on experience in deploying scalable systems using AWS and Azure, implementing microservices architectures, and maintaining CI/CD pipelines for efficient delivery.
Strong commitment to compliance, ensuring adherence to standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Excellent communication skills in both English (C1 level) and Polish (C1 level or native) while thriving in team settings, driven by self-motivation and a dedication to continuous improvement. Skilled in MLOps methodologies, including utilization of **Supabase** for backend services, and orchestration tools like MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow.

Managed databases using **PostgreSQL** to handle complex data structures, ensuring data integrity and efficient querying across applications.

Active engagement in teamwork to incorporate solutions that meet stakeholder requirements across diverse application frameworks, ensuring delivery timelines and quality standards are met.
Reinforced strong technical expertise in modern software development, ensuring a deep understanding of **methodologies knowledge** to enhance project efficiency and delivery.

Led code reviews and provided mentorship to junior developers, contributing to team growth and knowledge sharing within a fast-paced development environment.

Utilized **TypeScript**, **React** (18), and **Next.js** to build interactive front-end applications, creating responsive financial tools and admin panels that improved user engagement by **30%**.
Developed backend services using **Node.js** with NestJS/Express and Python (FastAPI, Django), implementing a microservices architecture that increased scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems by **40%**.
Implemented databases utilizing **PostgreSQL** to manage and store financial data effectively, ensuring data integrity and availability across the application.
Executed software development best practices throughout the software development lifecycle, leading to a **25%** reduction in time-to-market for new features.
Configured and managed an event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, enabling seamless asynchronous communication across workflows, enhancing responsiveness to operational demands.
Delivered comprehensive real-time analytics dashboards with **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, providing critical operational insights into transaction anomalies with a reporting accuracy of **95%**.
Designed ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for financial data ingestion, supporting both batch and real-time processing needs.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection leveraging **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, proactively identifying suspicious activities based on user behavior and transaction patterns.
Created ML pipelines for applications including real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, utilizing **MLflow** and **Airflow** for model integration into backend services.
Demonstrated strong communication skills in both English (C1 level) and Polish (C1 level or native), fostering clarity and collaboration within development teams.

• Conducted regular code reviews to ensure high standards of code quality and **teamwork**, facilitating a swift onboarding process for new developers and maintaining a collaborative atmosphere.
• Applied both verbal and written **communication skills** to articulate project updates and technical concepts clearly to stakeholders, resulting in improved cross-team collaboration and clarity on project objectives.
• Implemented responsive designs following the latest web standards, focusing on accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1), and contributing to SEO efforts that improved organic traffic by **15%**.
• Engaged in continuous personal development and **self-motivation**, proactively staying updated with technological advancements relevant to full-stack development.
